preqs: Students must have passed MGS1010 or MGB1010 or MGC1010 or MGP1010 or MGF1010 or MGW1010 or MGG1010 before undertaking this unit.

rules.ruleString: Unit was previously coded {GBU3308%, MGB3340, MGS3130, MGW3130%}
Must have passed 1 (I/W) units in {MGB1010, MGC1010, MGF1010, MGG1010, MGP1010, MGS1010, MGW1010} with grades other than {STANDARD-DEF, STANDARD-NS}
Incompatible with achievement in (I/W) {MGC3130, MGF3621, MGG3130, MGW3130}
Must be enrolled in course type {10, 20, 41, 50}

description: This unit introduces students to various concepts of organisational change and development. It covers topics including: theories of organisational development, organisational change and organisational transformation, the role of the organisational change practitioner, development of change interventions, employee responses to change and challenges of change.
